about.title: About our company
about.subtitle: Innovation Dental Clinic
about.text1: We provide a full range of dental and oral health care services. Our highly qualified team of specialists is ready to offer you professional assistance in the following areas:

list.text_1: Preventive dentistry: regular check-ups, teeth cleaning and care consultations.
list.text_2: Treatment of caries and gum diseases: filling of caries, removal of dental deposits, treatment of inflammation.
list.text_3: Aesthetic dentistry: teeth whitening, installation of veneers and crowns for a perfect smile.
list.text_4: Orthodontics: bite correction, installation of braces, transparent aligners.
list.text_5: Surgery: removal of wisdom teeth, tooth implantation, gum plastic.

politics.text_1: The course was created for cosmetologists to share information and experience for specialists who cannot attend training in person.
politics.text_2: The courses are introductory in nature with the technique of a cosmetologist.
politics.text_3: Distribution and sale of courses purchased on this site is prohibited.

masters.title: Our Team
masters.subtitle: Our doctors have high qualified skills and are guaranteed to help you recover from your disease.

director.title: Kubicz-Depa Edyta
director.desc: She loves working with people and has been involved in dentistry for 15 years. Helping and solving problems is her main mission. She is characterized by openness, kindness, and an optimistic approach to life.

list.title: Dr. Maryna Lalakina
list.desc: She is an implantologist, prosthetist, and gnathologist. She specializes in comprehensive oral cavity treatment along with the body. Dentistry is the love of her life. She has been working for 18 years, during which time she has developed her own individual approach to working with patients.

list.title: Dr. Oleksiy Volkov
list.desc: He mainly works under a microscope and has an effective approach to patient treatment. In 2013, he graduated from the M.I. Pirogov Medical University. After 2 years of postgraduate internship, he obtained the title of specialist dentist. Since 2015, he has been a member of the periodontal academy at UAP. From 2019 to 2021, he studied at the DTMD University in Luxembourg, specializing in Digital Technologies of Science. Upon completing his studies and defending his thesis, he was awarded the title of Master of Science (MSc) in Periodontology and Implantology.

list.title: Dr. Szablowska Monika
list.desc: She specializes in treating adults and children, focusing on conservative and aesthetic dentistry. She regularly enhances her qualifications by participating in numerous professional training courses. Her work is her passion, with the paramount value being the health and satisfaction of the patient.

list.title: Dr. Kovalchuk Tatiana
list.desc: She has extensive experience in treating patients of all ages: children, adolescents, and adults. She collaborates with doctors from other specialties in preparing patients for comprehensive orthodontic treatment. She promotes treatment with new methods, emphasizing invisible treatment using the latest techniques such as Invisalign braces and lingual braces, also utilizing anchorage with the use of mini implants.

list.title: Anna Ben
list.desc: Each treatment is tailored individually to the client's skin needs and expectations, which I learn during the initial consultation on the first visit. The consultation is an interview based on a conversation about lifestyle and skin analysis. In the clinic, I work on maintaining the naturalness and attractiveness of beauty. The result of these efforts is healthy, beautiful, and naturally looking skin.

list.title: Weronika Gargała
list.desc: After the GBT protocol. Certified dental hygienist Weronika Gargała is a graduate of the Non-Public Business School and the University of Rzeszów with a degree in biology. She has been working as a dental hygienist since 2014. In our clinic, she sees patients for preventive treatments (tartar removal, sandblasting, fluoridation) as well as teeth whitening. Her priority is the gentleness of the procedures performed and precision. She has completed numerous theoretical and practical training sessions to enhance her skills.

list.title: Gniewek Zuzanna
list.desc: She actively assists in all procedures, ensuring the comfort and well-being of the patient. She executes her profession with great dedication.

list.title: Maciołek Agnieszka
list.desc: She is characterized by high empathy.

list.title: Pryts Yevheniia
list.desc: He is a paramedic with 15 years of experience in providing assistance in emergency health situations. He is characterized by diligence and a positive outlook on life.

list.title: Trawka Paulina
list.desc: At work, she values smooth cooperation with the doctor and patient comfort. She is positive-minded, communicative, and friendly.

list.title: Ratyna Elżbieta
list.desc: At work, she values a good atmosphere. Contact with the patient is not a problem for her. An additional asset is her title as a dental assistant.

list.title: Naumenko Oleksandra
list.desc: Always eager to help foreigners. She converses in Ukrainian and Russian.

list.title: Yurii Panenkov
list.desc: Since obtaining the technician diploma, he has continuously been enhancing his qualifications and skills through numerous workshops and symposiums. In our laboratory, he serves as the manager, overseeing the processes of creating prosthetic works. He particularly specializes in crafting zirconium crowns, using the BPS system, as well as in frameworks for bridges, crowns, and implant systems.

get.text: The scope of conservative dentistry involves both oral cavity prevention and treatment of tooth decay-caused cavities. In our clinic, we perform all necessary dental procedures for the treatment and restoration of our patients' teeth.

3D scanner, dental laser, excellent Zeiss microscope, Beyond lamp for efficient sensitivity-free whitening, and intraoral cameras - these are just some of the conveniences for your comfort, safety, and highest quality of treatments.

When saving a tooth is not possible, implants come to the rescue. Simply put, an implant is a new root inserted in place of a removed tooth. Implants are made of titanium, which is treated by the body like bone, allowing it to fuse quickly. A crown or bridge prosthesis is screwed onto the implant, replacing missing teeth.

Not everyone is born with a perfect smile, but thanks to modern aesthetic dentistry solutions, most patients can boast beautiful, white, straight teeth today. Aesthetic dentistry allows for correcting the color, shape, and size of teeth. Bonding easily improves tooth aesthetics by rebuilding small chips or correcting minor imperfections on the tooth surface, without the need for grinding.

Prevention and hygiene include education on hygiene habits and ways to choose oral hygiene products, regular check-up visits, as well as a set of simple procedures: plaque removal (scaling), sandblasting, fluoridation, and tooth sealing.

get.proposition: We are a certified GBT system clinic by EMS
get.text: One of the most advanced protocols used in dental clinics is Guided Biofilm Therapy, or GBT. It is a comprehensive system that allows for effective removal of dental plaque, deposits, and discolorations, contributing to the maintenance of healthy gums and teeth.

Complementing the procedures carried out in the clinic is laser dentistry, which includes caries removal, periodontal pocket treatment, gum inflammation, hypersensitivity, gum correction, removal of lip hemangiomas, as well as inflammation of mouth corners, aphthae, or cold sores. The dentist uses two devices for this purpose: a diode laser and an erbium-yag and neodymium-yag laser.

We are the only clinic in Rzeszów that makes crowns from zirconium oxide or Emax ceramics in one day. Why? Because we have our own digital prosthetic laboratory. We offer a wide range of solutions for a harmonious and healthy smile. Dental prosthetics in our clinic is based on a modern CAD/CAM system.

Impacted wisdom tooth? Cyst or change at the tooth apex? Nothing to worry about. In our clinic, we offer painless, professional treatment performed by a surgeon who really enjoys what he does. Our doctors will also immediately help you in case of pain and the need to remove a tooth. We focus on professional and stress-free extractions in computer-assisted local anesthesia.

Orthodontic treatment involves moving teeth to improve their position and function. With orthodontics, you can effectively improve your appearance, increase self-confidence, and take care of the health of your teeth, gums, and temporomandibular joints. We realize how important not only health and correct bite are, but also the aesthetic dimension.
Endodontics treats dental pulp and root canal problems to preserve natural teeth.

RTG is one of the most important diagnostic techniques in medicine. Commonly known as an X-ray or radiography, it uses X-ray radiation to register a two-dimensional image of a patient's organs, allowing the detection of any abnormalities and making a diagnosis.

We know very well that dental treatment does not have to be associated with negative experiences. Therefore, we fully utilize the possibilities offered by modern pediatric dentistry. Colorful fillings that will appeal not only to girls, anesthesia in the form of flavored gel or spray - these are just a few of the many tricks we use to effectively eliminate the pain and fear of a child.

proposition.title: It’s time change your life today
